title: Woman Pretends To Be Waffle House Employee, No One Noticed For Hours Until She Started Stealing
description:

title: Bernie Sanders Proposes New Minimum Wage Hike, Guess How Many Hundreds Of Thousands Of Jobs It Would Kill
description:

There is so much evidence, that the only way someone can promote those ideas for decades is if they are extremely evil or extremely ignorant. title: NY Governor Ignores State's Real Problems, Signs Virtue Signaling Bill On Reparations Instead
description:

And just when you think she can’t possibly do any more damage, she whips out her sleeves and announces a not-so-surprising new initiative that will waste money that is not hers and create more division.

title: Watch: Trump BANNED from Colorado Ballot in 2024!? Here's What It Actually Means...
description:

title: LOL: Now "based" John Fetterman is dunking on zoomers and TikTok, and MSNBC is starting to take shots at him
description:

title: Obama campaign manager brags: Throwing Trump of CO ballot all about unifying Dems around "Biden campaign message"
description:
Let the lefties in your life know you fight like hell with the classic FIGHT LIKE HELL tee! Buy the shirt at CrowderShop.com.

On Tuesday, the Colorado Supreme Court announced that they were kicking Donald Trump off of the Colorado ballot over the insurrection he insurrected on January 6th, 2021.
